summary: [For 9 minute surviving fragment] Lucian, a soldier in Paris, is to ship out for Algiers at 9 that evening. He stops by for a last meal with his love, Marianne. He may be worried that when ... See full summary »
cast: Greta Garbo|Lars Hanson|Lowell Sherman|Polly Moran|Dorothy Cumming|Johnny Mack Brown|Cesare Gravina|Paulette Duval|Jean De Briac|Sonny Loy
title: The Divine Woman
